original_title: The Spider Within: A Spider-Verse Story
overview: Miles Morales struggles to balance his responsibilities as a teenager, friend and student while acting as Brooklynâ€™s friendly neighborhood superhero. After a particularly challenging day living with these pressures, Miles experiences a panic attack that forces him to confront the manifestations of his anxiety and learn that reaching out for help can be just as brave an act as protecting his city from evil.
title: The Spider Within: A Spider-Verse Story
